sources.title: Down to Mirth (1959)
sources.description: A mad scientist invents an anti-gravity machine, and is using it to create havoc on earth. Casper, the Friendly Ghost, gets involved with the mad-man and eventually forces him to destroy the machine and bring earth back to earth. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/down-to-mirth-1959/

metadata.Plot: A mad scientist invents an anti-gravity machine, and is using it to create havoc on earth. Casper, the Friendly Ghost, gets involved with the mad-man and eventually forces him to destroy the machine and bring earth back to earth.
metadata.Actors: Jackson Beck, Norma MacMillan, Jack Mercer
